docblock.description: CaseInsensitiveArray allows accessing elements with mixed-case keys.
docblock.long-description: This allows access to the array to be very forgiving. (i.e. If you access something with the wrong CaSe, it'll still find the correct element)

docblock.description: The DynamicResponseModel class.
The DynamicResponseModel class allows flexible and forgiving access to responses from the Postmark API.
Create a new DynamicResponseModel from an associative array.
Infrastructure. Get an element by name.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of element to get from the dynamic response model.

docblock.description: Infrastructure. Allows indexer to return a DynamicResponseModel.

docblock.description: The PostmarkAdminClient allows users to access and modify "Account-wide" settings. At this time the API supports management of the "Sender Signatures", and "Servers."
BASE_URL is "https://api.postmarkapp.com"
docblock.long-description: You may modify this value to disable SSL support, but it is not recommended. :var string:

docblock.description: Create a new PostmarkAdminClient.
docblock.long-description: :param string $account_token: The Account Token used to access the Admin API. This token is NOT the same as a Server Token. You can get your account token from this page: https://postmarkapp.com/account/edit

docblock.description: Request a given server by ID.
docblock.long-description: :param int $id: The Id for the server you wish to retrieve. :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get a list of all servers configured on the account.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $count: The number of servers to retrieve in the request, defaults to 100. :param integer $offset: The number of servers to "skip" when paging through lists of servers. :param string $name: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Delete a Server used for sending/receiving mail. NOTE: To protect your account, you'll need to contact support and request that they enable this feature on your account before you can use this client to delete Servers.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: The ID of the Server to delete. :return DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Modify an existing Server. Any parameters passed with NULL will be ignored (their existing values will not be modified).
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: The Identity of the Server to modify. :param string $name: :param string $color: :param bool $rawEmailEnabled: :param bool $smtpApiActivated: :param string $inboundHookUrl: :param string $bounceHookUrl: :param string $openHookUrl: :param bool $postFirstOpenOnly: :param bool $trackOpens: :param string $inboundDomain: :param integer $inboundSpamThreshold: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Create a new Server. Any parameters passed with NULL will be ignored (their default values will be used).
docblock.long-description: :param string $name: :param string $color: The color shown for the server in the Postmark web UI (may be any of the following: purple, blue, turqoise, green, red, yellow, grey) :param bool $rawEmailEnabled: :param bool $smtpApiActivated: :param string $inboundHookUrl: :param string $bounceHookUrl: :param string $openHookUrl: :param bool $postFirstOpenOnly: :param bool $trackOpens: :param string $inboundDomain: :param integer $inboundSpamThreshold Between 0 and 30. :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get a "page" of Sender Signatures.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $count :param integer $offset :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get information for a sepcific Sender Signature.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: The ID for the Sender Signature you wish to retrieve. :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Create a new Sender Signature for a given email address. Note that you will need to "verify" this Sender Signature by following a link that will be emailed to the "fromEmail" address specified when calling this method.
docblock.long-description: :param string $fromEmail: :param string $name: :param string $replyToEmail: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Alter the defaults for a Sender Signature.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :param string $name: :param string $replyToEmail: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Delete a Sender Signature with the given ID.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Cause a new verification email to be sent for an existing (unverified) Sender Signature.
docblock.long-description:
Sender Signatures require verification before they may be used to send email through the Postmark API.
:param integer $id: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Request that the Postmark API updates verify the SPF records associated with the Sender Signature's email address's domain. Configuring SPF is not required to use Postmark, but it is highly recommended, and can improve delivery rates.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Cause a new DKIM key to be generated and associated with the Sender Signature. This key must be added to your email domain's DNS records. Including DKIM is not required, but is recommended. For more information on DKIM and its purpose, see http://www.dkim.org/
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: The base request method for all API access.
docblock.long-description: :param string $method: :param string $path: :param string $body: :returns: JSON HTTP API Response. :rtype: object

docblock.description: PostmarkClient provides the main functionality used to send an analyze email on a "per-Server" basis. If you'd like to manage "Account-wide" configuration, see the PostmarkAdminClient.
BASE_URL is "https://api.postmarkapp.com"
docblock.long-description: You may modify this value to disable SSL support, but it is not recommended. :var string:

docblock.description: Create a new PostmarkClient.
docblock.long-description: :param string $server_token: The token associated with "Server" you'd like to use to send/receive email from.

docblock.description: Send an email.
docblock.long-description: :param string $from: The sender of the email. (Your account must have an associated Sender Signature for the address used.) :param string $to: The recipient of the email. :param string $subject: The subject of the email. :param string $htmlBody: The HTML content of the message, optional if Text Body is specified. :param string $textBody: The text content of the message, optional if HTML Body is specified. :param string $tag: A tag associated with this message, useful for classifying sent messages. :param boolean $trackOpens: True if you want Postmark to track opens of HTML emails. :param string $replyTo: Reply to email address. :param string $cc: Carbon Copy recipients, comma-separated :param string $bcc: Blind Carbon Copy recipients, comma-separated. :param array $headers: Headers to be included with the sent email message. :param array $attachments: An array of PostmarkAttachment objects. :rtype: DyanamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Send multiple emails as a batch
docblock.long-description: :param array $emailBatch: An array of emails to be sent in one batch. Each email can be an associative array of values, but note that the 'Attachments' key must be an array of 'PostmarkAttachment' objects if you intend to send attachments with an email. :rtype: DyanamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get an overview of the delivery statistics for all email that has been sent through this Server.
docblock.long-description: :rtype: DyanamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get a batch of bounces to be processed.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $count: :param integer $offset: :param string $type: :param bool $inactive: :param string $emailFilter: :param string $tag: :param string $messageID: :return DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Locate information on a specific email bounce.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :rtype: DyanamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get a "dump" for a specific bounce.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :rtype: string

docblock.description: Cause the email address associated with a Bounce to be reactivated.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :rtype: DyanamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get the list of tags associated with messages that have bounced.
docblock.long-description: :rtype: array

docblock.description: Get the settings for the server associated with this PostmarkClient instance (defined by the $server_token you passed when instantiating this client)
docblock.long-description: :rtype: DyanamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Modify the associated Server. Any parameters passed with NULL will be ignored (their existing values will not be modified).
docblock.long-description: :param string $name: :param string $color: :param bool $rawEmailEnabled: :param bool $smtpApiActivated: :param string $inboundHookUrl: :param string $bounceHookUrl: :param string $openHookUrl: :param bool $postFirstOpenOnly: :param bool $trackOpens: :param string $inboundDomain: :param integer $inboundSpamThreshold: :rtype: DyanamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Search messages that have been sent using this Server.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $count: :param integer $offset: :param string $recipient: :param string $fromEmail: :param string $tag: :param string $subject: :rtype: DyanamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get information related to a specific sent message.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get the raw content for a message that was sent.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :rtype: string

docblock.description: Get messages sent to the inbound email address associated with this Server.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $count: :param integer $offset: :param string $recipient: :param string $fromEmail: :param string $tag: :param string $subject: :param string $mailboxHash: :param string $status: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get details for a specific inbound message.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Allow an inbound message to be processed, even though the filtering rules would normally prevent it from being processed.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get statistics for tracked messages, optionally filtering by various open event properties.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $count: :param integer $offset: :param string $recipient: :param string $tag: :param string $clientName: :param string $clientCompany: :param string $clientFamily: :param string $osName: :param string $osFamily: :param string $osCompany: :param string $platform: :param string $country: :param string $region: :param string $city: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get information about individual opens for a sent message.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :param integer $count: :param integer $offset: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get an overview of the messages sent using this Server, optionally filtering on message tag, and a to and from date.
docblock.long-description: :param string $tag: :param string $fromdate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :param string $todate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get send statistics for the messages sent using this Server, optionally filtering on message tag, and a to and from date.
docblock.long-description: :param string $tag: :param string $fromdate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :param string $todate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get bounce statistics for the messages sent using this Server, optionally filtering on message tag, and a to and from date.
docblock.long-description: :param string $tag: :param string $fromdate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :param string $todate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get SPAM complaint statistics for the messages sent using this Server, optionally filtering on message tag, and a to and from date.
docblock.long-description: :param string $tag: :param string $fromdate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :param string $todate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get bounce statistics for the messages sent using this Server, optionally filtering on message tag, and a to and from date.
docblock.long-description: :param string $tag: :param string $fromdate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :param string $todate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get open statistics for the messages sent using this Server, optionally filtering on message tag, and a to and from date.
docblock.long-description: :param string $tag: :param string $fromdate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :param string $todate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get platform statistics for the messages sent using this Server, optionally filtering on message tag, and a to and from date.
docblock.long-description: :param string $tag: :param string $fromdate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :param string $todate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get email client statistics for the messages sent using this Server, optionally filtering on message tag, and a to and from date.
docblock.long-description: :param string $tag: :param string $fromdate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :param string $todate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get reading times for the messages sent using this Server, optionally filtering on message tag, and a to and from date.
docblock.long-description: :param string $tag: :param string $fromdate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :param string $todate: must be of the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Create a Tag Trigger.
docblock.long-description: :param string $matchName: :param boolean $trackOpens: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Delete a Tag Trigger with the given ID.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Locate Tag Triggers matching the filter criteria.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $count: :param integer $offset: :param string $matchName: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Edit an existing Tag Trigger
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :param string $matchName: :param boolean $trackOpens: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Retrieve information related to the associated Tag Trigger
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Create an Inbound Rule to block messages from a single email address, or an entire domain.
docblock.long-description: :param string $rule: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Get a list of all existing Inbound Rule Triggers.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $count: :param integer $offset: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: Delete an Inbound Rule Trigger.
docblock.long-description: :param integer $id: :rtype: DynamicResponseModel

docblock.description: The base request method for all API access.
docblock.long-description: :param string $method: :param string $path: :param string $body: :returns: JSON HTTP API Response. :rtype: object

docblock.description: This is the core class that interacts with the Postmark API. All clients should inherit fromt this class.
BASE_URL is "https://api.postmarkapp.com"
docblock.long-description: You may modify this value to disable SSL support, but it is not recommended. :var string:
